Ask for identification
Don’t sign contracts w/ blank spaces.pic.twitter.com/bmF9NCHoYY

html: We cannot allow our military and national security to be held hostage by those who want to continue the reckless spending of the last administration. This is not how our government is supposed to work, and I believe we need reforms in how the Senate treats appropriations bills.
text: We cannot allow our military and national security to be held hostage by those who want to continue the reckless spending of the last administration. This is not how our government is supposed to work, and I believe we need reforms in how the Senate treats appropriations bills.

html: When I ran for Congress I pledged to do all I could to begin rebuilding our military, and this bill accomplishes this critical task. I’m deeply disappointed that Senate Democrats refused to pass the defense bill the House has sent to them not once but four times.
text: When I ran for Congress I pledged to do all I could to begin rebuilding our military, and this bill accomplishes this critical task. I’m deeply disappointed that Senate Democrats refused to pass the defense bill the House has sent to them not once but four times.

html: Investing in our defense operations gives certainty to our warfighters on the front lines and strengthens our national security in a dangerous world. That’s why President Trump and Secretary Mattis strongly supported the budget agreement.
text: Investing in our defense operations gives certainty to our warfighters on the front lines and strengthens our national security in a dangerous world. That’s why President Trump and Secretary Mattis strongly supported the budget agreement.

html: By reversing these damaging “sequestration cuts” that have gutted our military and making necessary defense investments, we are beginning to repair a decade’s worth of damage.
text: By reversing these damaging “sequestration cuts” that have gutted our military and making necessary defense investments, we are beginning to repair a decade’s worth of damage.

html: Right now, we have ships that cannot go to sea, planes that cannot fly, and troops without the equipment they need to deploy.
text: Right now, we have ships that cannot go to sea, planes that cannot fly, and troops without the equipment they need to deploy.

html: It is wrong for us to send our best young men and women into harm's way without the resources they need, asking them to make up with their efforts, and their risk, for our shortcomings.
text: It is wrong for us to send our best young men and women into harm's way without the resources they need, asking them to make up with their efforts, and their risk, for our shortcomings.

html: Congress has passed a budget deal to fully fund our military by reversing harmful “sequestration cuts” and keep our government up and running.
text: Congress has passed a budget deal to fully fund our military by reversing harmful “sequestration cuts” and keep our government up and running.

html: It’s time for the Senate to get its act together. The House has passed full defense funding three times in the last year. And tonight, we will do it for a fourth time. #SetOurTroopsFreepic.twitter.com/S7OEqLPqhn
text: It’s time for the Senate to get its act together. The House has passed full defense funding three times in the last year. And tonight, we will do it for a fourth time. #SetOurTroopsFreepic.twitter.com/S7OEqLPqhn

html: The American people deserve transparency and releasing this memo is a step in the right direction in restoring faith in our justice system. I urge Attorney General Sessions to continue doing all he can to ensure each and every American receives equal justice under law.
text:
The American people deserve transparency and releasing this memo is a step in the right direction in restoring faith in our justice system.

I urge Attorney General Sessions to continue doing all he can to ensure each and every American receives equal justice under law.

html: There cannot be two standards of justice, one for Republicans and another for Democrats. We must return to a Federal Bureau of Investigation and a Department of Justice that we can trust.
text: There cannot be two standards of justice, one for Republicans and another for Democrats. We must return to a Federal Bureau of Investigation and a Department of Justice that we can trust.

html: President Trump made the right decision to allow for the release the memo to the American people. The memo demonstrates how politicized federal law enforcement had become during the Obama Administration. The police power of the state must be blind to politics.
text:
President Trump made the right decision to allow for the release the memo to the American people. 

The memo demonstrates how politicized federal law enforcement had become during the Obama Administration. The police power of the state must be blind to politics.

html: Next week is an important one for the Apalachicola River & Bay. On Monday, I will be attending SCOTUS oral arguments in the FL v. GA water wars case, which focuses on a judge’s findings that Georgia’s upstream water uses have harmed the Apalachicola ecosystem & fisheries.
